column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
1. Amazon CloudFront: Increase Data transfer out to internet from 10 to 20TB/month, Data transfer out to origin from 5 to 10TB/month, Number of requests (HTTPS) from 15000000 to 25000000/month
2. S3 Standard: Increase S3 Standard storage from 10 to 20 TB/month, Data Transfer Outbound from 5 to 30TB/month
3. EC2: Changed instance type from m5a.8xlarge to m5.12xlarge
4. RDS for MariaDB: Changed instance type DB from db.m5.2xlarge to db.m5.4xlarge, storage volumn io1
5. Add service Amazon CloudWatch to monitor the system
6. Add SNS to receive system monitoring notifications and unusual alerts
